headline: M.L.B.’s Feud With the Minors Hits a Boiling Point
abstract: Major league officials, dismayed by a public back-and-forth with the minor leagues over a proposal to significantly overhaul their joint system, delivered a pointed letter on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Ever since the news of Major League Baseball’s plan to overhaul the minor leagues emerged in October, major league and minor league officials have carried out a public relations battle, volleying statements and letters back and forth amid contentious negotiations.
